title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the contents of the db field accurately.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:

1. Have a db field with three types of content:
   a) HTML text within <html></html> tags.
   b) HTML fragments not within <html></html> tags.
   c) Text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
